name: Personal Data
description: Information linked to identified or identifiable natural person

name: Racial or Ethnic Origin
description: Personal data revealing racial or ethnic origin

name: Health Diagnosis
description: Personal data revealing mental or physical health diagnosis

name: Citizenship Status
description: Personal data revealing citizenship or immigration status

name: Genetic or Biometric ID
description: Processing genetic or biometric data for unique identification

name: Child Data
description: Personal data collected from known child under 13

name: De-identified Data
description: Data cannot reasonably be linked to identified person
